Package src

Class Worker

java.lang.Object
src.User
src.Worker
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<User>
Direct Known Subclasses:
Chef, Courier
public class Worker extends User
Worker class is a subclass of User class which represents the Workers of the restaurant.

    static enum 
    Worker.WorkerStatus
    Status of the worker will be change according to it's experience year, certificate number etc.

    • calculateSalary

      protected void calculateSalary(double initialSalary)
      Salary of the worker will be calculated according to that worker's WorkerStatus. An initial amount will be assigned to beginner status, and it will increase with increment of status.
      Parameters:
      initialSalary - The initial salary of the worker.

    • calculateAverageScore

      public double calculateAverageScore(int _score)
      The function calculates the average score of the worker by adding the new incoming score to the total score and dividing it by the updated vote amount.
      Parameters:
      _score - The score that is coming from the user.
      Returns:
      The average score of the worker.

    • dismissalControl

      public boolean dismissalControl()
      Dismissal Conditions: There should be at least 10 given votes for considering score. If vote amount is reasonable, workers that has less score value than 4 should be fired.
      Returns:
      boolean value is false for "don't fire", and true for "fire"

    • toString

      public String toString()
      The function returns a string that contains the information of the worker
      Overrides:
      toString in class User
      Returns:
      The toString method is being returned.
